cat.label: 101-Catalogue viewer
cat.def: Client service that allows a user to interact with a catalogue to locate, browse, and manage metadata about geographic data or geographic services.

cat.label: 102-Geographic viewer
cat.def: Client service that allows a user to view one or more feature collections or coverages.

cat.label: 103-Geographic spreadsheet viewer
cat.def: Client service that allows a user to interact with multiple data objects and to request calculations similar to an arithmetic spreadsheet but extended to geographic data.

cat.label: 104-Service editor
cat.def: Client service that allows a user to control geographic processing services.

cat.label: 105-Chain definition editor
cat.def: Provides user interaction with a chain definition service.

cat.label: 106-Workflow enactment manager
cat.def: Provides user interaction with a workflow enactment service.

cat.label: 107-Geographic feature editor
cat.def: Geographic viewer that allows a user to interact with feature data.

cat.label: 108-Geographic symbol editor
cat.def: Client service that allows a human to select and manage symbol libraries.

cat.label: 109-Feature generalisation editor
cat.def: Client service that allows a user to modify the cartographic characteristics of a feature or feature collection by simplifying its visualisation, while maintaining its salient elements – the spatial equivalent of simplification.

cat.label: 110-Geographic data-structure viewer
cat.def: Client service that allows a user to access part of data set to see its internal structure.

cat.label: 201-Feature access service
cat.def: Service that provides a client access to and management of a feature store.

cat.label: 202-Map access service
cat.def: Service that provides a client access to a geographic graphics, i.e. pictures of geographic data.

cat.label: 203-Coverage access service
cat.def: Service that provides a client access to and management of a coverage store.

cat.label: 204-Sensor description service
cat.def: Service that provides the description of a coverage sensor, including sensor location and orientation, as well as the sensor’s geometric, dynamic, and radiometric characteristics for geo-processing purposes.

cat.label: 205-Product access service
cat.def: Service that provides access to and management of a geographic product store.

cat.label: 206-Feature type service
cat.def: Service that provides a client to access to and management of a store of feature type definitions.

cat.label: 207-Catalogue service
cat.def: Service that provides discovery and management services on a store of metadata about instances.

cat.label: 208-Registry Service
cat.def: Service that provides access to store of metadata about types.

cat.label: 209-Gazetteer service
cat.def: Service that provides access to a directory of instances of a class or classes of real-world phenomena containing some information regarding position.

cat.label: 210-Order handling service
cat.def: Service that provides a client with the ability to order products from a provider.

cat.label: 211-Standing order service
cat.def: Order handling service that allows a user to request that a product over a geographic area be disseminated when it becomes available.

cat.label: 301-Chain definition service
cat.def: Service to define a chain and to enable it to be executed by the workflow enactment service.

cat.label: 302-Workflow enactment service
cat.def: The workflow enactment service interprets a chain and controls the instantiation of services and sequencing of activities.

cat.label: 303-Subscription service
cat.def: Service to allow clients to register for notification about events.

cat.label: 401-Coordinate conversion service
cat.def: Service to change coordinates from one coordinate system to another coordinate system that is related to the same datum.

cat.label: 402-Coordinate transformation service
cat.def: Service to change coordinates from a coordinate reference system based on one datum to a coordinate reference system based on a second datum.

cat.label: 403-Coverage/vector conversion service
cat.def: Service to change the spatial representation from a coverage schema to a vector schema, or vice versa.

cat.label: 404-Image coordinate conversion service
cat.def: A coordinate transformation or coordinate conversion service to change the coordinate reference system for an image.

cat.label: 05-Rectification service
cat.def: Service for transforming an image into a perpendicular parallel projection and therefore a constant scale.

cat.label: 406-Orthorectification service
cat.def: A rectification service that removes image tilt and displacement due to terrain elevation.

cat.label: 407-Sensor geometry model adjustment service
cat.def: Service that adjusts sensor geometry models to improve the match of the image with other images and/or known ground positions.

cat.label: 408-Image geometry model conversion service
cat.def: Service that converts sensor geometry models into a different but equivalent sensor geometry model.

cat.label: 409-Subsetting service
cat.def: Service that extracts data from an input in a continuous spatial region either by geographic location or by grid coordinates.

cat.label: 410-Sampling service
cat.def: Service that extracts data from an input using a consistent sampling scheme either by geographic location or by grid coordinates.

cat.label: 411-Tiling change service
cat.def: Service that changes the tiling of geographic data.

cat.label: 412-Dimension measurement service
cat.def: Service to compute dimensions of objects visible in an image or other geodata.

cat.label: 413-Feature manipulation services
cat.def: Register one feature to another, an image, or another data set or coordinate set; correcting for relative translation shifts, rotational differences, scale differences, and perspective differences. Verify that all features in the Feature Collection are topologically consistent according to the topology rules of the Feature Collection, and identifies and/or corrects any inconsistencies that are discovered.

cat.label: 414-Feature matching service
cat.def: Service that determines which features and portions of features represent the same real world entity from multiple data sources, e.g., edge matching and limited conflation.

cat.label: 415-Feature generalisation service
cat.def: Service that reduces spatial variation in a feature collection to increase the effectiveness of communication by counteracting the undesirable effects of data reduction.

cat.label: 416-Route determination service
cat.def: Service to determine the optimal path between two specified points based on the input parameters and properties contained in the Feature Collection.

cat.label: 417-Positioning service
cat.def: Service provided by a position-providing device to use, obtain and unambiguously interpret position information, and determines whether the results meet the requirements of the use.

cat.label: 418-Proximity analysis service
cat.def: Given a position or geographic feature, finds all objects with a given set of attributes that are located within a user-specified distance of the position or feature.

cat.label: 501-Geoparameter calculation service
cat.def: Service to derive application-oriented quantitative results that are not available from the raw data itself.

cat.label: 502-Thematic classification service
cat.def: Service to classify regions of geographic data based on thematic attributes.

cat.label: 503-Feature generalisation service
cat.def: Service that generalises feature types in a feature collection to increase the effectiveness of communication by counteracting the undesirable effects of data reduction.

cat.label: 504-Subsetting service
cat.def: Service that extracts data from an input based on parameter values.

cat.label: 505-Spatial counting service
cat.def: Service that counts geographic features.

cat.label: 506-Change detection service
cat.def: Service to find differences between two data sets that represent the same geographical area at different times.

cat.label: 507-Geographic information extraction services
cat.def: Services supporting the extraction of feature and terrain information from remotely sensed and scanned images.

cat.label: 508-Image processing service
cat.def: Service to change the values of thematic attributes of an image using a mathematical function.

cat.label: 509-Reduced resolution generation service
cat.def: Service that reduces the resolution of an image.

cat.label: 510-Image Manipulation Services
cat.def: Services for manipulating data values in images: changing colour and contrast values, applying various filters, manipulating image resolution, noise removal, striping, systematic-radiometric corrections, atmospheric attenuation, changes in scene illumination, etc.

cat.label: 511-Image understanding services
cat.def: Services that provide automated image change detection, registered image differencing, significance-of-difference analysis and display, and area-based and model-based differencing.

cat.label: 512-Image synthesis services
cat.def: Services for creating or transforming images using computer-based spatial models, perspective transformations, and manipulations of image characteristics to improve visibility, sharpen resolution, and/or reduce the effects of cloud cover or haze.

cat.label: 513-Multiband image manipulation
cat.def: Services that modify an image using the multiple bands of the image.

cat.label: 514-Object detection service
cat.def: Service to detect real-world objects in an image.

cat.label: 515-Geoparsing service
cat.def: Service to scan text documents for location-based references, such as a place names, addresses, postal codes, etc., in preparation for passage to a geocoding service.

cat.label: 516-Geocoding service
cat.def: Service to augment location-based text references with geographic coordinates (or some other spatial reference).

cat.label: 601-Temporal reference system transformation service
cat.def: Service to change the values of temporal instances from one temporal reference system to another temporal reference system.

cat.label: 602-Subsetting service
cat.def: Service that extracts data from an input in a continuous interval based on temporal position values.

cat.label: 603-Sampling service
cat.def: Service that extracts data from an input using a consistent sampling scheme based on temporal position values.

cat.label: 604-Temporal proximity analysis service
cat.def: Given a temporal interval or event, find all objects with a given set of attributes that are located within a user-specified interval from the interval or event.

cat.label: 701-Statistical calculation service
cat.def: Service to calculate the statistics of a data set.

cat.label: 702-Geographic annotation services
cat.def: Services to add ancillary information to an image or a feature in a feature collection.

cat.label: 801-Encoding service
cat.def: Service that provides implementation of an encoding rule and provides an interface to encoding and decoding functionality.

cat.label: 802-Transfer service
cat.def: Service that provides implementation of one or more transfer protocols, which allows data transfer between distributed information systems over offline or online communication media.

cat.label: 803-Geographic compression service
cat.def: Service that converts spatial portions of a feature collection to and from compressed form.

cat.label: 804-Geographic format conversion service
cat.def: Service that converts from one geographic data format to another.

cat.label: 805-Messaging service
cat.def: Service that allows multiple users to simultaneously view, comment about, and request edits of feature collections.

cat.label: 806-Remote file and executable management
cat.def: Service that provides access to secondary storage of geographic features as if it were local to the client.
